reason: Duplicate answer - identical to q_4_0497-q_4_0501 (sixth copy). Question asks about 기간과 횟수 (period and frequency) but answer contains no such information.
Answer accurately summarizes 학원과 관련 없는 기관 및 업체 rules: 범위, 업무, 겸직 가능 여부, 제한 사항. All content verified against page 285 source.
Question asks about 행정 처리 담당자 (administrative processing person) but answer is duplicate of q_4_0515 about 범위/업무/겸직 가능 여부. Source has no info about 행정 처리 담당자. Answer does not address the question.
Question uses raw section markers from source headings ('① 평생직업교육학원 과정에서 □ 겸직 허가 절차'). Not a natural question. Answer is a raw dump of source content.
Question fabricated - asks about '교육청에서 자주 질의하는 내용' but source has no such FAQ context. Uses raw section marker ①. Answer is a content dump that does not address the fabricated question.
Answer correctly states 겸직허가 기간 최대 1년, 연장 신청 rules (종료일 1개월 이전), 소속기관 변경 시 재신청. Source text verified on page 286 line 7.
Answer accurately lists 징계 양정 기준 for 사교육업체 영리행위 by severity level (파면-해임 through 견책). All details verified against page 286 징계 양정 기준 table.
Duplicate of q_4_0528 - same question topic (겸직허가 기간 최대), same source text, nearly identical answer content.
Answer covers 위반 시 조치 (겸직허가 취소, 재심사, 징계 의결 요구) and 징계 양정 기준. Source text verified on page 286. Distinct from q_4_0529 in focusing on 조치 process rather than just 징계 양정.
Question uses raw section marker '라.' and has grammar error ('비위의 비위의 정도' - '비위의' repeated). Not a natural user question. Source text verified but question quality is unacceptable.
